content: Here are upcoming webcasts on Analytics, Big Data, Data Science and Data Mining for May 26 and later.  See full schedule at www.kdnuggets.com/webcasts/index.html . When Event May 27 8 am PT 11 am ET  The Data Lake Debate , Moderator: Mark Dobeck, IIA Faculty Guests: Tamara Dull and Anne Buff of SAS Best Practices. May 27 10 am PT 1 pm ET  Building an Analytics Team - Conversation with Brian Clifton , by InfoTrust. May 27 11 am PT 2 pm ET  In-Memory Computing: Driving the Internet of Things , By GridGain. May 28 10 am PT 1 pm ET  3 Ways to Improve Targeted Marketing with Analytics , By Salford Systems. May 28 10 am PT 1 pm ET  Advanced Analytics for the Business Professional , by James Taylor, Decision Management Solutions. May 28 11 am PT 2 pm ET  Reducing Mean Time to Know , by Sqrrl. May 29 10 am PT 1 pm ET  Building Real-time Streaming Apps in Minutes , by Impetus. June 2 10 am PT 1 pm ET  Emerging Big Data Technologies: Pentaho Labs Presents Apache Spark , by Pentaho Labs. Jun 2 1 pm PT 4 pm ET  Predictive Insights: Turning Machine Data Into Intelligent Action , The Briefing Room with Dr. Robin Bloor and Predixion. Jun 3 10 am PT 1 pm ET  Storytelling with Web Analytics by Brian Clifton , by InfoTrust. Jun 9 11 am PT 2 pm ET  Using Big Data to Acquire In-Market Consumers , by DataMentors. Jun 10 8 am PT 11 am ET  Data Mining: Failure to Launch , by The Modeling Agency. Jun 11 7/10 am PT 10 am/1 pm ET  Shrinking Big Data , by Gartner. June 11 8 am PT 11 am ET  On-Demand RDF Graph Databases in the Cloud , By Ontotext. Jun 18 9 am PT noon ET  Big Data Webinar: Using electronic health records for better care , by Stanford Center for Professional Development. Jun 23 10 am PT 1 pm ET  Tips & Tricks for Logistic Regression , By Salford Systems. Jun 25 8 am PT 11 am ET  How to Stream Web Data to Your Data Warehouse , by Ronald van Loon, Adversitement.

Upcoming Webcasts on Analytics, Big Data, Data Science – May 26 and beyond

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: GridGain, IIA, James Taylor, Ontotext, Pentaho, Salford Systems, TMA

The Data Lake Debate, 3 Ways to Improve Targeted Marketing, Turning Machine Data Into Intelligent Action, Data Mining - Failure to Launch, Using electronic health records for better care, and more.
